Scripts.OnLoad: this:SetBackdropColor(0,0,0) if UnitClass("player") == "Warrior" or UnitClass("player") == "Rogue" or UnitClass("player") == "Druid" then this:RegisterEvent("VARIABLES_LOADED") else this:Hide() end

if UnitPowerType("player") == "1" then --mana this:SetBackdropColor(1,1,0) this:SetHeight(RageTrackerFrame:GetHeight()) this:SetWidth(UnitMana("player")*(RageTrackerFrame:GetWidth())/100+1) RageTrackerFrame_TextFrame_Text:SetText("Mana: "..UnitMana("player")) this:RegisterEvent("UNIT_MANA") end if UnitPowerType("player") == "2" then --rage this:SetBackdropColor(1,1,0) this:SetHeight(RageTrackerFrame:GetHeight()) this:SetWidth(UnitMana("player")*(RageTrackerFrame:GetWidth())/100+1) RageTrackerFrame_TextFrame_Text:SetText("Rage: "..UnitMana("player")) this:RegisterEvent("UNIT_RAGE") end if UnitPowerType("player") == "3" then --energy this:SetBackdropColor(1,1,0) this:SetHeight(RageTrackerFrame:GetHeight()) this:SetWidth(UnitMana("player")*(RageTrackerFrame:GetWidth())/100+1) RageTrackerFrame_TextFrame_Text:SetText("Energy: "..UnitMana("player")) this:RegisterEvent("UNIT_ENERGY") end
